about.title: About Me
about.para1: I am a skilled Fullstack Developer with over a decade of experience in designing and building scalable web applications. Throughout my career, I have worked with leading organizations, delivering high-quality solutions that enhance user experience and drive business success. My expertise spans both frontend and backend technologies, allowing me to develop seamless and efficient applications.
about.para2: My passion for Fullstack Development goes beyond writing codeâ€”I thrive on solving complex challenges, optimizing performance, and creating intuitive user interfaces. I am committed to continuous learning and staying up to date with the latest industry trends to deliver innovative and impactful solutions.

items.name: Web design
items.desc: Web design is the process of creating the visual layout and user experience of a website, focusing on aesthetics and usability to enhance user engagement.

items.name: Graphics design
items.desc: Graphic design involves the art of combining text and images to communicate ideas visually. It encompasses branding, advertisements, and various media for effective visual storytelling.

items.name: Social media
items.desc: Social media management includes creating, curating, and analyzing content shared on social platforms to build a community, engage audiences, and enhance brand visibility.

items.name: App design
items.desc: App design focuses on creating user-friendly interfaces and experiences for mobile applications, ensuring seamless navigation and interaction to enhance user satisfaction.

items.name: Digital marketing
items.desc: Digital marketing encompasses all marketing efforts that use the internet or electronic devices, including SEO, content marketing, and social media, to connect with target audiences.

items.name: Content writing
items.desc: Content writing is the creation of written material for online platforms, aimed at engaging readers and driving traffic through informative, persuasive, and entertaining content.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.desc: I am currently available to take on new project, So feel free a message about anything that you want me to work on .You can Contact anytime.

footer.desc: I am a fullstack developer from ,SriLanka with 1+ years of experiance in fullstack development.
